gps.h
1#pragma once
2
3#include "config.h"
4#include "sensorModel.h"
5#include "utils.h"
6
7class GpsSensorModel : public SensorModel {
8private:
9 pros::Gps gps;
10 Angle sensorAngleOffset;
11 Eigen::Vector2f point{};
12 double std{0.0};
13 bool notInstalled{false};
14public:
15 GpsSensorModel(const Angle sensorAngleOffset, pros::Gps gps)
16 : gps(std::move(gps)),
17 sensorAngleOffset(sensorAngleOffset) {
18 }
19
20 void update() override {
21 notInstalled = !gps.is_installed() || gps.get_error() > 0.015;
22 auto [x, y] = gps.get_position();
23
24 point = Eigen::Vector2f(-y, x);
25
26 std = gps.get_error() * 8.0;
27 }
28
29 std::optional<double> p(const Eigen::Vector3f& X) override {
30 if (notInstalled) [[unlikely]] {
31 return std::nullopt;
32 }
33
34 return cheap_norm_pdf(sqrt(X.x() * point.x() + X.y() * point.y()) / 2.0f) * LOCO_CONFIG::GPS_WEIGHT;
35 }
36
37 Angle getAngle() {
38 return -gps.get_yaw() * 1_deg - sensorAngleOffset;
39 }
40
41 pros::Gps& getGps() {
42 return gps;
43 }
44
45 ~GpsSensorModel() override = default;
46};
